turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to make an order at Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which peet's did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Main Street in Wilkes-Barre, Plains.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what would you like to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get an iced caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The smallest size they have, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so the order is 1 small iced caramel macchiato from peet's on main street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add any other flavors?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add some sugar?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem. 1 small iced caramel macchiato with sugar it is. the total for the order is $3.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submittted your order. it'll be ready for pick up in 10 minutes. i've also sent the receipt to you via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that is all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect. you're welcome.
